darkened_gem: %1$sIt seems to buzz when close to pumpkins...%2$s
netherium_staff: %1$sA haunted artifact from a dark past%2$s
cursed_pumpkin: %1$sRetaines the life giving properties of a normal pumpkin%2$s
journal_1: %1$sThe magic within a darkened gem could be a good potion enhancer%2$s
journal_2: %1$sBlocks harder then iron are needed to support the cursed pumpkin%2$s
journal_3: %1$sThe alchemical dust within aero bones seems to be a good base for a new potion%2$s

netherium_ingot: %1$sThe sheer weight of these ingots makes them unsuitable for practical tools%2$s
